name: Through The Darkness (ismartal, Alecxs Sunders, Ashar)
name_original: Through The Darkness (ismartal, Alecxs Sunders, Ashar)
description:
A little girl wakes up troubled in an unknown, cold and dark place. How did she get to that place, perhaps through some kind of sorcery? Or is it just a nightmare? Be that as it may, have no choice but to find a way out and survive the darkness and the dangers that lurk in this macabre place.

Through The Darkness is a game with pixel art graphics, dungeon exploration, stealth and survival.

Controls

 WASD or arrow keys -move

 Z key to interact with objects.

Credits

ashar (twitter, itch) - Programming

Ismartal (twitter, itch, artstation) - Art

Alecx Sunders (twitter, itch, soundcloud) - Music
